history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: pos2nat,pos2nat_prop. qsimpl time: 1 use: pos2nat_inj,pos2nat,pos2nat_prop. qsimpl time: 1 use: pos2nat_inj,pos2nat,pos2nat_prop. qsimpl time: 1 use: pos2nat_inj,pos2nat,pos2nat_prop.

exceptions.tactic: assert (pos2nat p < n) as H0 by apply (pos2nat_prop n p).
exceptions.exn: In environment n, i : nat H : i < n p := nat2pos H : pos n The term "n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "pos ?n".
In environment n0 : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat H0 : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), n0 n p < n n, i : nat H : i < n Unable to unify "?M1648 = ?M1649" with "n0 n (nat2pos H) = i".
The reference p was not found in the current environment.
Found no subterm matching "Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt ?M2040)" in the current goal.

In environment n2 : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat H4 : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), n2 n p < n H3 : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), pos2nat p = pos2nat q -> p = q n1 : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat H2 : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), n1 n p < n n0 : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat H0 : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), n0 n p < n n, i : nat H : i < n H1 : forall x y : nat, x = y -> forall x0 y0 : nat, x0 = y0 -> x < x0 -> y < y0 Unable to unify "S ?M2559 <= ?M2562" with "n0 n (nat2pos H) = i".

In environment n3 : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat H5 : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), n3 n p < n H1 : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), pos2nat p = pos2nat q -> p = q n2 : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat H4 : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), n2 n p < n n1 : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat H2 : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), n1 n p < n n0 : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat H0 : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), n0 n p < n n, i : nat H : i < n Unable to unify "i" with "n0 n (nat2pos H)".

original: pose (p := nat2pos H). assert (pos2nat p < n) as H0 by apply (pos2nat_prop n p). apply pos2nat_inj. unfold p. rewrite Fin.to_nat_of_nat. simpl. f_equal. apply PeanoNat.Nat.lt_wd_obligation_1. reflexivity.
